hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash rm -rf $WORKSPACE/* git clone https://${GIT_ACCESS_TOKEN}@github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/vetservices-refdata.git cd vetservices-refdata git checkout development cd vetservices-refdata-perftest echo ${WORKSPACE} sh /opt/jmeter/apache-jmeter-4.0/bin/jmeter.sh -Jjmeter.save.saveservice.output_format=csv -n -t RefdataLoadPerformanceTest.jmx -Jloadusers=4 -Jlduration=2 -Jprotocol=https -Jbaseurl=ci.internal.vets-api.gov -Jport=443 -l ${WORKSPACE}/testresult.csv -e -o ${WORKSPACE}/htlmlreport zip -r ${WORKSPACE}/../../../htlmlreport.zip ${WORKSPACE}/htlmlreport
